name: Blob (itch) (Oakamoore)
description:
Blob is a top-down shooter, with both singleplayer and multiplayer components. 

The multiplayer was built using Photon's Unity Networking solution. 

This game was built for a games networking module for University.

Controls:

Right Click - Move to cursor position

Left Click - Shoot slime ball 

References:

Models:

- Slime: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/slime-creature-f176c00e63c24155b2c308b06cdb32d8 (Modified within Blender)

- Main Menu Letters: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/bubble-letters-ef49e3ea68f04223b173d86991c77d1c 

- Stylised Rocks: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/stylized-stones-minipack-719d8ee393db4b218ace19c...

- Environment: https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/free-low-poly-handpainted-environment-pack-05477...

Sound Effects:

- Shoot sound: https://freesound.org/people/deoking/sounds/411671/

- Impact sound: https://freesound.org/people/yottasounds/sounds/232135/

This was made using Unity 2022.1.15
